description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. *** Quest of Camaraderie and Care is a turn-based strategy game that you can play solo or with up to three friends in local co-op. Guide the 5 unique characters through eerie dungeons, defeat dangerous foes awaiting you there and search for epic treasures. Develop your character, learn new skills and find powerful items that strengthen your hero on this epic journey of over 50 hours of playtime!
